metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34673 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvidia.ko), where an out-of-bounds array access may lead to denial of service, information disclosure, or data tampering.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
